text: Hermann Hunger (born 1942) is an Austrian professor emeritus and Assyriologist at the University of Vienna from which he retired in 2007. He has been recognized for his work on Babylonian astronomy and celestial omens."Biographies of Modern Historians of Ancient Occidental Astral Sciences" by Gary D. Thompson (retrieved April 27, 2015) == Published works == * * * * == References == Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian academics Category:Austrian historians
title: Hermann Hunger
